manifest.install: CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_task_user` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `openid` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `uid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `logintime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `status` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '默认0 正常 1认证（已缴纳保证金） 2拉黑', `uniacid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `deposit` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '保证金', `city` varchar(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `mobile` varchar(15) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '手机号码', `qrcode` varchar(200) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '微信二维码', `pubnumber` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '发布数量', `acceptnumber` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '采纳数量', `creditscore` decimal(6,1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '10.0' COMMENT '信誉分数', `guytype` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '人物类型，1是发任务的，2是接任务的', `guydesc` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '个人描述', `guysort` int(5) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '所属人物分类', `contacttype` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '联系方式 0没有联系方式，1手机 2微信二维码 3两者都支持', `replynumber` int(9) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '回复数量', `acceptednumber` int(9) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '被采纳数量', `nickname` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '淘宝版本里用到 昵称', `headimgurl` varchar(300) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '淘宝版本里用到 头像', `sex` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '淘宝版本里用到 1男 2女', `activity` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '淘宝版本里用到 活跃度', `uptime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '淘宝版本里用到 更新活跃度时间', `ispub` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '淘宝版本里用到 0不是发任务的 1是', `isacc` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '淘宝版本里用到 0不是接任务的 1是', `conweixin` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '淘宝版本里用到 0不开启微信联系 1 开启', `conmobile` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '淘宝版本里用到 0不开启电话联系 1开启', `parent` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '淘宝版本里用到 上级id', `limitnum` int(5) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '回复次数限制', `account` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '账户，绑定电话号码', `createtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间', `giveparent` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '上级获得提成总额', `authopenid` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '被借权公众号的openid', `alipayname` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '支付宝姓名', `alipay` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '支付宝账户', `verifystatus` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0未提交认证 1已提交认证 2认证通过 3认证不通过', `verifyform` text COMMENT '额外提交的表单', `mark` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '标记备注内容', `limitday` int(5) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '限制抢任务的天数', `tbpub` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '发布担保任务数量', `tbsuccess` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '采纳担保任务数量', `tbtake` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '抢到担保任务数量', `tbcom` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '完成担保任务数量', `payqr` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `uselimitnum` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '限制抢试用任务数量', `uselimitday` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '限制抢试用任务数量', `givetwo` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '累计给上上级的提成', `givethree` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '累计给上上级的提成', `level` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0普通 1一级 2二级', `utime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '会员到期时间', `anwm` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '累计付费阅读', `yinp` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00', `baoshi` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00', `verifyend` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '认证结束', `iscostauth` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0未付费认证 1已付', `qq` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `pp` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '上上级', `ppp` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '上上级', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `inx_openid` (`openid`,`uniacid`), KEY `inx_guy` (`guysort`,`guydesc`,`city`), KEY `index_uid` (`uid`), KEY `createtime` (`createtime`), KEY `pp` (`pp`), KEY `ppp` (`ppp`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1563 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_ad` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `title` varchar(2000) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '标题', `number` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '分类排序，越大越前', `content` mediumtext COMMENT '广告内容', `time` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '发布时间', `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0显示 1下架', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_anwbox` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `uid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '会员id', `taskid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '任务id', `readid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `money` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '金额', `endtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '结束时间', `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0未领取 1已领取', `createtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `gettime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '领取时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `uid` (`uid`), KEY `taskdi` (`taskid`), KEY `endtime` (`endtime`), KEY `readid` (`readid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_anwgeted` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `uid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '会员id', `createtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `money` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00', `thisday` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '回馈的日期', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `uid` (`uid`), KEY `createtime` (`createtime`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_anwread` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `uid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '会员uid', `taskid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '任务id', `createtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间', `cost` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '花费', `endtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '到期时间', `puberfee` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '发布者的', `lrfee` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '系统利润', `boxfee` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '宝箱', `sysfee` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '系统成本', `isshared` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否已分成宝箱 0未 1已分', `iscountbox` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0未计算宝箱 1已计算宝箱', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `uid` (`uid`), KEY `taskid` (`taskid`), KEY `createtime` (`createtime`), KEY `iscountbox` (`iscountbox`), KEY `isshared` (`isshared`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_authform` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `name` varchar(150) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '表单名称', `number` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '排序序号', `formtype` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '类型', `useric` varchar(2500) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '虚假昵称', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `index` (`uniacid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_banner` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `img` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `number` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '排序，越大越前', `url` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `name` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '名称', `desc` varchar(120) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `index` (`uniacid`,`number`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_codekey` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `key` varchar(33) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_complain` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `content` varchar(1500) DEFAULT NULL, `images` varchar(2000) DEFAULT NULL, `time` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '时间', `openid` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, `taskid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '任务id', `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0未处理 1已处理', `userid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '会员id', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `index` (`uniacid`,`openid`,`taskid`), KEY `taskid` (`taskid`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `openid` (`openid`), KEY `userid` (`userid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=9 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='投诉'; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_continue` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `money` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '连续奖励金额', `totalmoney` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '奖励的总金额', `totalnum` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '数量', `backmoney` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '结算退回金额', `prizemoney` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '已给的奖励金额', `isback` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0未结算 1已结算', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `index` (`uniacid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='连续任务数据'; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_draw` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `openid` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `money` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '金额', `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '状态 0待确认 1已支付 2退回 3拒绝', `createtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间', `dealtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '处理时间', `backreason` varchar(125) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '退回理由', `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '1余额 2保证金', `refusereason` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '拒绝支付理由', `paytype` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0微信支付 1支付宝支付', `alipayname` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL, `alipay` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, `userid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '会员id', `payno` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, `server` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '服务费', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `index` (`uniacid`,`openid`,`status`), KEY `createtime` (`createtime`), KEY `dealtime` (`dealtime`), KEY `userid` (`userid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1194 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='提现表'; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_group` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `createtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `mem` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `totalcost` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '总计花费', `totalback` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '总计返回', `endtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '结束时间', `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0正常 1已结束', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `createtime` (`createtime`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_groupbs` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `createtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `uid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `money` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00', `baoshi` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `createtime` (`createtime`), KEY `uid` (`uid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_groupds` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `createtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `uid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `takedid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `taskid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `yinp` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00', `givedser` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '给打赏者的', `givedsed` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '给被打赏者的', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `createtime` (`createtime`), KEY `uid` (`uid`), KEY `takedid` (`takedid`), KEY `taskid` (`taskid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_grouplog` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `createtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `uid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `gid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `cost` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00', `geted` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '最后活动', `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0未发放 1已发放', `endtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `createtime` (`createtime`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_guysort` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `img` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `number` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '排序，越大越前', `name` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `index` (`uniacid`,`number`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_imess` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `openid` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, `uid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'member uid', `type` varchar(120) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '类型', `targetid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `remark` varchar(255) DEFAULT '' COMMENT '备注', `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0未读 1已读', `url` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `createtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `content` varchar(2000) DEFAULT NULL, `isbig` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0弹窗提醒 1不弹窗提醒', `istop` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `openid` (`openid`), KEY `uid` (`uid`), KEY `type` (`type`), KEY `targetid` (`targetid`), KEY `status` (`status`), KEY `isbig` (`isbig`), KEY `createtime` (`createtime`), KEY `istop` (`istop`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_instruct` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `down` text, `set` text, `level` text, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=6 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='投诉'; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_instructa` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `content` text, `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0答案', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `type` (`type`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=5 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='说明'; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_mess` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `openid` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, `taked` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '任务被回复通知 0开启 1关闭', `messaged` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '被留言提问', `count` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '任务被结算', `reply` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '回复被处理', `getmessage` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '留言被回复', `getpri` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '获得私包任务', `newdown` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '新增小弟', `downmoney` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '小弟提成', `downact` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '获赠活跃度通知', `usesuborder` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '私包任务 提交订单内容', `useaddcontent` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '使用任务补充内容', `newtask` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '新任务通知', `userid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '会员id', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `index` (`uniacid`,`openid`), KEY `openid` (`openid`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `userid` (`userid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=6 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_message` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `str` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, `openid` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, `userid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '会员id', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `userid` (`userid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='投诉'; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_moneylog` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `openid` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `taskid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '对应的任务id', `money` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '金额', `status` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '资金记录状态', `time` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '变化时间', `type` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '资金记录类型 1任务资金，2平台使用费，3提现扣除余额，4任务完成收入 5私包任务支出 6私包任务被取消退回资金 7私包任务收益 8任务自动结束退回资金，9加急扣除，10管理员变动，11提现退回，12充值收入，13任务不通过退回', `aftermoney` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '变动后余额', `mtype` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '1余额记录 2保证金记录', `userid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '会员id', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `inx_moneylog` (`uniacid`,`openid`,`taskid`,`type`), KEY `openid` (`openid`), KEY `taskid` (`taskid`), KEY `type` (`type`), KEY `userid` (`userid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=11440 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='资金记录'; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_paylog` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `openid` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `uid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `time` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '支付或者创建时间', `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '类型 0未支付 1已支付', `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '类型 1任务保证金 2充值', `fee` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '金额', `orderid` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '内部订单编号', `uorderid` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '微信订单编号', `userid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '会员id', `utype` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '升级会员类型', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `inx_many` (`uniacid`,`openid`,`uid`,`orderid`,`uorderid`), KEY `openid` (`openid`), KEY `orderid` (`orderid`), KEY `uorderid` (`uorderid`), KEY `time` (`time`), KEY `userid` (`userid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=969 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='支付记录'; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_privatetask` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `puber` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '发起者', `accepter` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, `workeropenid` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '任务执行者openid', `bossopenid` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '任务雇主openid', `tasktitle` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '任务内容', `taskmoney` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '任务金额', `workerserver` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '扣做任务者 平台使用费', `images` varchar(1500) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '任务图片', `limittime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '限时，小时为单位', `createtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间', `accepttime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '接受者处理时间', `workerdealtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '执行者提交完成.或取消时间', `bossdealtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '雇主确认或拒绝时间', `complaintime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '雇员同意拒绝或投诉时间', `admindealtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '管理员对投诉处理时间', `status` tinyint(2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '任务状态 0等待确认，1任务被拒绝，2执行中，3雇员提交完成待雇主确认， 4雇员主动取消执行任务，5雇员没有提交完成而自动取消，6雇主确认后任务完成，7任务完成效果不好被雇主拒绝，8任务被雇员同意拒绝而结束，9任务被雇员投诉阶段，10管理员处理后结束,11雇主没有确认完成任务自动确认完成，12待雇员接受拒绝或投诉状态而没有处理自动接受，13管理员判给雇员而结束，14管理员判给雇主而结束', `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '类型，1索要的任务。2主动发给对方任务，2是已支付的', `complainreason` varchar(200) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '投诉内容', `admindealresult` varchar(200) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '管理员处理结果', `refusereason` varchar(200) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '雇主拒绝理由', `overtime0` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '待确认的任务自动取消时间', `overtime2` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '执行中任务自动结束时间', `overtime3` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '待雇主确认状态自动确认时间', `overtime7` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '雇员确认拒绝状态自动确认时间', `completecontent` text COMMENT '回复的内容', `bossserver` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '扣雇主服务费', `isend` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0未结束 1已结束', `giveparent` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '上级奖励', `pubuid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '会员id', `acceptuid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '会员id', `bossuid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '会员id', `workeruid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '会员id', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `inx_private` (`uniacid`,`puber`,`workeropenid`,`bossopenid`,`status`,`accepter`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `puber` (`puber`), KEY `accepter` (`accepter`), KEY `workeropenid` (`workeropenid`), KEY `bossopenid` (`bossopenid`), KEY `createtime` (`createtime`), KEY `pubuid` (`pubuid`), KEY `acceptuid` (`acceptuid`), KEY `bossuid` (`bossuid`), KEY `workeruid` (`workeruid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=13 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='私包任务'; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_puber` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `headimg` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `nickname` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL, `falsepub` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `falsetake` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `falsedep` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `pub` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '发布量', `take` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '采纳量', `cost` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '支出', `pubnum` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '发布任务个数', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_readtask` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `type` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `uid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `tid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `type` (`type`), KEY `uid` (`uid`), KEY `tid` (`tid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_remindlog` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `createtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '时间', `takedid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '回复id', `content` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '内容', `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0前端发的 1后端发的', `images` varchar(2500) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '图片', `mtype` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0提醒 1补充的内容', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `takedid` (`takedid`), KEY `createtime` (`createtime`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1560 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='普通任务提醒 和 补充内容'; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_scan` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `times` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '访问次数', `pubed` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '已发布数量', `comed` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '已完成', `commpubed` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '普通任务发布数量', `commcomed` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '普通任务完成数量', `privatepubed` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '私包任务发布数量', `privatecomed` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '私包任务完成数量', `usepubed` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '试用任务发布数量', `usecomed` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '试用任务完成数量', `tbpubed` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `tbcomed` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `index` (`uniacid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=8 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_selfposter` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `params` mediumtext, `bgimg` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `key` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '关键词', `pid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '规则id', `content` varchar(2000) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '扫码后提示', `ccontent` varchar(2000) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '生成海报后提示', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `key` (`key`), KEY `pid` (`pid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=4 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_selfqrcode` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `openid` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, `qrcodeid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'qrcode表里的id', `sence` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, `expire` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '过期时间', `userid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '会员id', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `openid` (`openid`), KEY `qrcodeid` (`qrcodeid`), KEY `sence` (`sence`), KEY `index` (`uniacid`,`openid`,`qrcodeid`,`sence`), KEY `userid` (`userid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=12 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_selfquest` ( `id` `number` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '排序序号，越大越前', `content` mediumtext COMMENT '内容', `settype` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '1系统添加的 0自己添加的', `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0正常 1隐藏', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=22 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_sign` ( `id` 'uid', `day` varchar(22) DEFAULT NULL, `give` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00', `flag` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `createtime` (`createtime`), KEY `uid` (`uid`), KEY `day` (`day`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_slider` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '0不显示 1主页显示', `isusetask` tinyint(1) unsigned DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '0不显示 1试用任务页面显示', `istbtask` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0不显示', `isguy` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '找人页面', `dayy` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `index` (`uniacid`,`number`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=4 DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0不是模板 1模板', `name` varchar(122) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `istemp` (`istemp`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_tabbar` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `name` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '分类名称', `number` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '越大越前', `img` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `url` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `color` varchar(22) DEFAULT NULL, `actcolor` varchar(22) DEFAULT NULL, `actimg` varchar(555) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `index` (`uniacid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='导航'; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_taked` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `openid` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '抢的人', `taskid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '任务id', `createtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间', `waittime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '能回复的时间', `endtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '释放时间，如果时间大于现在占用，小于现在已释放', `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0刚抢到还没回复 1已回复 2已采纳 3已被拒绝', `content` text COMMENT '回复内容', `money` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '赏金', `server` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '扣除平台费', `ewai` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '额外奖励', `replytime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '回复时间', `dealtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '雇主或系统处理时间', `images` varchar(2000) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '回复的图片', `puber` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '发布者openid 方便计算数量限制', `giveparent` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '给上级奖励', `continueid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '任务对于的连续id', `reason` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '拒绝理由', `ip` varchar(42) DEFAULT NULL, `isscan` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0可以浏览看见 1不允许看见', `subform` text, `userid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '会员id', `pubuid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '会员id', `twoupmoney` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '上上级提成', `threeupmoney` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '上上上级奖励', `adminadd` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '管理员增加余额数值', `ds` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00', `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0正常 1虚假的', `nick` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '虚假昵称', `headimg` varchar(555) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '虚假头像', `isfalse` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0正常 1虚假的', `falseuid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '虚拟会员id', `isremind` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0未提醒 1已提醒', `gid` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `index` (`uniacid`,`openid`,`taskid`,`continueid`,`ip`,`puber`,`endtime`), KEY `taskid` (`taskid`), KEY `openid` (`openid`), KEY `continueid` (`continueid`), KEY `ip` (`ip`), KEY `puber` (`puber`), KEY `endtime` (`endtime`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `ewai` (`ewai`), KEY `createtime` (`createtime`), KEY `status` (`status`), KEY `userid` (`userid`), KEY `pubuid` (`pubuid`), KEY `type` (`type`), KEY `isremind` (`isremind`), KEY `gid` (`gid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=11345 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='抢任务记录'; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_task` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `title` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `content` text COMMENT '任务内容', `images` varchar(2000) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '图片', `iska` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0不卡首屏 1卡首屏', `num` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '任务数量', `money` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '任务单价', `replytime` int(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '等待回复时间', `limitnum` int(6) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '限制回复数量', `sex` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0不限制性别 1男性可回复 2女性可回复', `ishide` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0不隐藏 1隐藏', `continue` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0不连续发布 1连续发布', `continueid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '连续发布任务的id', `kagoodid` varchar(64) DEFAULT '' COMMENT '卡首屏商品id', `kakey` varchar(2000) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '卡首屏关键字', `start` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '开始时间', `end` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '结束时间', `status` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0正常 1审核中 2下架', `closereason` varchar(300) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '审核不通过原因', `istop` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0未置顶 1置顶', `puber` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '发布者', `sortid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '分类id', `isimage` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0不限制图片 1抢到后才可见', `iscount` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0还未结算 1已结算结束', `backmoney` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '结算退回钱', `counttime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '结算时间', `costserver` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '花费的服务费', `costka` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '花费的卡首屏', `isempty` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0没有被抢光 1被抢光了', `scan` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '浏览量', `isstart` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0已开始 1未开始', `costtop` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '置顶费用', `createtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `link` varchar(2000) DEFAULT NULL, `hidecontent` text COMMENT '定制的 隐藏内容', `autoaddnum` int(8) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '定制的 自动追加数量', `autotime` int(8) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '定制的 自动追加的次数', `costautoadd` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '定制的 自动追加花费', `backautoadd` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '定制的 退回自动追加', `skiptype` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '定制的 0链接跳转 1口令跳转', `isautoadd` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '定制的 0不自动追加 1自动追加', `totalauto` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '定制的 总计自动追加数量', `autoadded` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '定制的 已增加的自动追加', `paymoney` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '需支付金额', `prizetype` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '奖励类型 0赏金 1实物', `prizetitle` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '奖励标题', `prizeimg` varchar(350) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '奖励图片', `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0普通任务 1试用任务', `pic` varchar(350) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '淘宝商品图片', `taokey` varchar(150) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '下单商品淘口令', `findtype` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'WQ 搜商品方式 0直接跳转 1关键字搜 2都关闭', `findkey` varchar(2500) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '搜商品关键词', `isarealimit` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0不做区域限制 1限制到区县 2限制到市', `province` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '限制的省份', `city` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '城市', `country` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '区县', `costfindkey` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '试用任务花费的关键词搜', `ispause` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '开启任务', `isform` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0不用提交表单 1提交表单', `gtitle` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '淘宝商品标题', `istaskform` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0不使用模板 1使用回复模板', `formid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '模板id', `userid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '会员id', `giveparent` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '发任务上级提成', `givetwo` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '上上级', `givethree` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00', `address` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '任务地址', `readprice` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '查看答案价格', `isread` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0不可看 1可看', `falsepuber` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '虚拟id', `falsenum` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '虚拟数量', `useric` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '虚假昵称', `idcode` varchar(15) DEFAULT NULL, `headimg` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `levellim` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0不限制 1一级可接 2二级可接 3二三级可接', `mark` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `gid` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL, `stepid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `index` (`uniacid`,`continueid`,`start`,`end`,`puber`,`sortid`,`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `continueid` (`continueid`), KEY `start` (`start`), KEY `end` (`end`), KEY `sortid` (`sortid`), KEY `status` (`status`), KEY `iscount` (`iscount`), KEY `puber` (`puber`), KEY `createtime` (`createtime`), KEY `userid` (`userid`), KEY `limitnum` (`limitnum`), KEY `type` (`type`), KEY `isempty` (`isempty`), KEY `ispause` (`ispause`), KEY `counttime` (`counttime`), KEY `falsepuber` (`falsepuber`), KEY `idcode` (`idcode`), KEY `levellim` (`levellim`), KEY `gid` (`gid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1187 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='普通任务'; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_taskform` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `name` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '分类名称', `number` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '越大越前', `form` text, `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0普通任务', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `index` (`uniacid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_taskmessage` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `content` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL, `openid` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, `parent` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '回复的id', `taskid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '任务id', `time` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '留言时间', `isadmin` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0不是管理员发布的任务，1是的', `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0普通任务', `userid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '会员id', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `index` (`uniacid`,`openid`,`parent`,`taskid`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `openid` (`openid`), KEY `taskid` (`taskid`), KEY `parent` (`parent`), KEY `userid` (`userid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=532 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='任务留言'; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_tasksort` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `name` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '分类名称', `order` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '分类排序，越大越前', `title` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '默认发布任务的标题', `content` text COMMENT '默认 任务内容', `number` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '越大越前', `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0正常 1下线', `img` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `dmoney` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '默认金额', `other` mediumtext, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `index` (`uniacid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=16 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='任务分类'; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_tbblack` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `openid` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '会员openid', `target` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '黑名单目标', `userid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '会员id', `targetuid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '会员id', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `openid` (`openid`), KEY `target` (`target`), KEY `userid` (`userid`), KEY `targetuid` (`targetuid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='黑名单'; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_tbcert` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `createtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '时间', `takedid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '回复id', `content` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '内容', `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0前端发的 1后端发的', `images` varchar(2500) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '图片', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `takedid` (`takedid`), KEY `createtime` (`createtime`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='担保任务申诉凭证'; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_tbform` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `name` varchar(66) DEFAULT NULL, `number` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '越大越前', `title` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `num` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `money` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00', `tbmoney` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00', `step` varchar(2222) DEFAULT NULL, `content` text, `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0正常 1下架', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `status` (`status`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_tbremind` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `createtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '时间', `takedid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '回复id', `content` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '内容', `pos` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0前端发的 1后端发的', `from` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0担保任务提醒', `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0提醒 1发佣金', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `takedid` (`takedid`), KEY `createtime` (`createtime`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='普通任务提醒 和 补充内容'; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_tbtaked` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `openid` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '抢的人', `taskid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '任务id', `createtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间', `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0抢到任务待审核 1审核未通过 2审核通过进行中 3任务完成 4失败待雇员确认 5任务失败 6申诉中 7管理员已判 8申诉失败任务失败 9申诉成功任务完成', `content` text COMMENT '回复内容', `money` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '扣除的赏金', `server` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '收益扣除平台费', `puber` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '发布者openid 方便计算数量限制', `giveparent` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '给上级奖励', `reason` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '拒绝理由', `isend` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0任务进行中 1任务结束', `takecontent` varchar(4000) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '抢任务提交的内容', `passtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '通过时间', `nopasstime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '未通过时间', `nopassreason` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '未过审核原因', `step` tinyint(2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '任务步骤 1上传浏览图片 2上传下单图片 3上传签收图片 4上传评价图片 5备注留言 6完成', `stepcontent` text COMMENT '每个步骤的内容', `tbmoney` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '扣除的保证金', `costserver` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '审核任务扣除服务费', `comtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '完成时间', `setfailtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '雇主设为失败的时间', `failreason` varchar(150) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '失败原因', `confirmfailtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '雇员确认失败时间', `complaintime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '雇员申诉时间', `complainstep` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0申诉中 1已判给雇员 2已判给雇主', `adminsettime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '管理员判断时间', `complainentime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '申诉结束时间', `complainto` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '申诉最终判给谁 0雇员 1雇主', `subcomtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '上传完资料，提交完成时间', `islimitstep` int(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0不限定第一步结束时间 1限定', `mtype` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0用保证金支付的 1用余额支付的', `userid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '会员id', `pubuid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '会员id', `givetwo` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '上上级', `givethree` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '上上上级', `gid` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL, `gived` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '已经发放的金额', `iscangive` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0不可发佣金 1可发佣金', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `taskid` (`taskid`), KEY `openid` (`openid`), KEY `puber` (`puber`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `createtime` (`createtime`), KEY `subcomtime` (`subcomtime`), KEY `setfailtime` (`setfailtime`), KEY `complainentime` (`complainentime`), KEY `passtime` (`passtime`), KEY `userid` (`userid`), KEY `pubuid` (`pubuid`), KEY `gid` (`gid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='抢担保任务记录'; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_tbtask` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `title` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `content` text COMMENT '任务内容', `images` varchar(2000) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '图片', `hideimages` varchar(2000) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '隐藏的图片', `iska` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0不卡首屏 1卡首屏', `num` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '任务数量', `money` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '任务单价', `limitnum` int(6) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '限制抢的次数', `sex` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0不限制性别 1男性可回复 2女性可回复', `kagoodid` varchar(64) DEFAULT '' COMMENT '卡首屏商品id', `kakey` varchar(2000) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '卡首屏关键字', `start` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '开始时间', `end` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '结束时间', `status` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0正常 1审核中 2下架', `istop` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0未置顶 1置顶', `puber` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '发布者', `iscount` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0还未结算 1已结算结束', `backmoney` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '结算退回钱', `counttime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '结算时间', `costserver` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '花费的服务费', `costka` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '花费的卡首屏', `isempty` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0没有被抢光 1被抢光了', `scan` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '浏览量', `costtop` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '置顶费用', `createtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `link` varchar(2000) DEFAULT NULL, `hidecontent` text COMMENT '定制的 隐藏内容', `skiptype` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '定制的 0链接跳转 1口令跳转', `tbmoney` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '担保金额', `isstart` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0 开始中 1未开始', `step` varchar(2000) DEFAULT NULL, `closereason` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '审核不通过原因', `topendtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '置顶结束时间', `userid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '会员id', `giveparent` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '发任务上级提成', `givetwo` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '上上级', `givethree` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00', `isarealimit` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0不做区域限制 1限制到区县 2限制市', `province` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, `city` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, `country` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, `tkl` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '淘口令', `gid` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL, `address` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '任务地址', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `start` (`start`), KEY `end` (`end`), KEY `puber` (`puber`), KEY `createtime` (`createtime`), KEY `countdata` (`uniacid`,`end`,`iscount`), KEY `topendtime` (`topendtime`), KEY `userid` (`userid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='担保任务'; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_tbtaskstep` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `openid` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, `step` varchar(2000) DEFAULT NULL, `userid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '会员id', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `openid` (`openid`), KEY `userid` (`userid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='任务步骤'; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_useaddcontent` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `content` varchar(800) DEFAULT NULL, `img` varchar(2000) DEFAULT NULL, `takedid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '回复的id', `createtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间', `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0补充内容 1提醒内容', `taskid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '任务id', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `takedid` (`takedid`), KEY `taskid` (`taskid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=4 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_useric` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `name` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL, `number` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='支付记录'; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_userics` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `uid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '会员uid', `icid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '标签id', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='支付记录'; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_usersort` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `sortid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uid` (`uid`), KEY `sortid` (`sortid`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_usetasklog` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `openid` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, `taskid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '任务编号', `createtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间', `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0申请中 1已通过 2审核不通过 3雇员主动取消 4已提交订单号 5已完成 6已拒绝结果失败', `isactivity` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否有效的试用 0有效 1无效 ，当被拒绝或取消后变为1记为无效', `passortime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '通过或拒绝时间', `canceltime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '雇员主动取消任务时间', `subcontent` varchar(2000) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '提交内容', `subtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '提交订单时间', `suctime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '设为成功时间', `prizemoney` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '赏金金额', `reason` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '拒绝和失败原因', `tosuctime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '转为成功时间', `failtime` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '任务失败时间', `iscomplained` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0未被投诉 1被投诉', `giveparent` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '给上级的提成', `initcontent` varchar(2000) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '抢任务提交的内容', `puber` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, `userid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '会员id', `pubuid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '会员id', `givetwo` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '上上级', `givethree` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '上上上级', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `openid` (`openid`), KEY `taskid` (`taskid`), KEY `passortime` (`passortime`), KEY `createtime` (`createtime`), KEY `puber` (`puber`), KEY `userid` (`userid`), KEY `pubuid` (`pubuid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=4 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE `ims_zofui_tasktb_vauth` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `params` text, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
